This week: literary giant Margaret Atwood is prepared for mega-bears… Tim Gunn returns, just in time to save listeners from the  ‘comfort trap’…  guitarist Steve Gunn (no relation) spins a mellow party playlist… The author behind the bestselling “Jack Reacher” series lists toughs he loves… ”China, Illinois” Animator Brad Neely wants Hulk Hogan to eat him… The tale of one man’s flight(s) to settle a bar bet… And we meet Rihanna, P.I.  Plus: Rico tastes a bowlful of sweet, savory surrealism.

","type":"text/html"},{"content":"

title: Episode 220: Margaret Atwood, Gunn Culture, and Hulk Hogan: Hero
description: This week: literary giant Margaret Atwood is prepared for mega-bears… Tim Gunn returns, just in time to save listeners from the  ‘comfort trap’…  guitarist Steve Gunn (no relation) spins a mellow party playlist… The author behind the bestselling “Jack Reacher” series lists toughs he loves… ”China, Illinois” Animator Brad Neely wants Hulk Hogan to eat him… […]

contentencoded: This week: literary giant Margaret Atwood is prepared for mega-bears… Tim Gunn returns, just in time to save listeners from the  ‘comfort trap’…  guitarist Steve Gunn (no relation) spins a mellow party playlist… The author behind the bestselling “Jack Reacher” series lists toughs he loves… ”China, Illinois” Animator Brad Neely wants Hulk Hogan to eat him… The tale of one man’s flight(s) to settle a bar bet… And we meet Rihanna, P.I.  Plus: Rico tastes a bowlful of sweet, savory surrealism.
